title: The Tree. - 1st ed.
creator_credit: Dimension Films, Churchill Films and Michael Murphy
brief_description: This film describes the beauty of trees, and introduces simple ideas of ecology. Living things depend on each other; a tree is important to the community of birds, insects, plants and animals living around it. Written by Edward Schuman. Suitable for upper primary level.
